Name: DailyHeartlandsNews/PinkCrystalDiscovery
Body: Archaeologists excavating near the Jungle's heart have uncovered a previously unknown minibiome brimming with luminous pink crystals. These structures emit a faint hum and seem to resonate with the surrounding flora. Initial reports suggest the crystals may have been part of an ancient Auric ritual site, though their exact purpose remains unknown. Locals claim touching them induces visions of 'a heart surrounded by gleaming artwork.'
